Subject: Notification of Rejected Applications {!ReviewStepApplication__c.ApplicationName__c} promoted by OGM
Dear {!GDH__ReviewStepApplication__c.GDH__FOOwnerName__c},
This is to notify that, OGM user has promoted the previously rejected application {!ReviewStepApplication__c.ApplicationName__c}.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants support team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely, EGMS Team
